page.title: 15RELIGION IN PETROCKSTOWE
page.content: There are 2 Churches: the Parish Church of St.Petroc and the Methodist Chapel. Rebuilt in 1870, the Church is served by a Rector (Rectory in the village)whose living covers 5 parishes over 40 sq.miles in the Diocese of Exeter. Services are held in rotation, with Communion celebrated in the Parish every 2 weeks. An average con- gregation would number 15 adults and children. The Chapel, built in 1933, is served by a Minister whose living comprises 12 Chapels.Services are held weekly, with lay preachers officiating & the ordained Minister present fort- nightly.Average congregation 15 adults & children. Of 86 people willing to answer questions about their religious beliefs 2 said they were agnostic, 58 belonged to the Anglican, 20 to the Methodist & 5 to the Catholic Church, with 22 people attending regularly.
